title: Review 2: Units 4-6 - Comparatives, Must/Mustn't, Should/Shouldn't, Will

theory.brief: Ôn tập Units 4-6: So sánh hơn (Comparative), Must/Mustn't (phải/cấm), Should/Shouldn't (nên/không nên), Will/Won't (tương lai đơn), Some/Any (một vài), Countable/Uncountable Nouns (danh từ đếm được/không đếm được).
examples: My house is bigger than yours. (Nhà tôi lớn hơn nhà bạn.)
You must do your homework. (Bạn phải làm bài tập.)
You should eat vegetables. (Bạn nên ăn rau.)
We will visit grandparents. (Chúng ta sẽ thăm ông bà.)
I have some books. (Tôi có vài cuốn sách.)

exercises.question: This city is _______ (modern) than my hometown.
You _______ be quiet in the library.
You _______ eat in the computer room.
We _______ visit our grandparents next week.
There are _______ (many/much) students in the class.
There isn't _______ (many/much) water in the bottle.
Life in the city is _______ than in the countryside.
You _______ help your parents with housework.
